text:
Association of #Myocarditis With BNT162b2 Messenger RNA #COVID19 #Vaccine in a Case Series of #Children

15 children who were hospitalized with myocarditis after receipt of the #mRNA vaccine for 1 to 5 days, boys were most often affected after the 2d dose
https://t.co/GUub8Pf6ni https://t.co/vFPK9tjTfq
